escaped_html: <div class="r"><a href="https://gist.github.com/Zen-CODE/650099bd55247223986928f12df42176" ping="/url?sa=t&amp;source=web&amp;rct=j&amp;url=https://gist.github.com/Zen-CODE/650099bd55247223986928f12df42176&amp;ved=2ahUKEwj5mYaGz_LoAhU0Ln0KHYVbDTwQFjAEegQIBhAB"><br><h3 class="LC20lb DKV0Md">Suggestion text example.py · GitHub</h3><div class="TbwUpd NJjxre"><cite class="iUh30 bc tjvcx">gist.github.com<span class="eipWBe"> › Zen-CODE</span></cite></div></a><div class="B6fmyf"><div class="TbwUpd"><cite class="iUh30 bc tjvcx">gist.github.com<span class="eipWBe"> › Zen-CODE</span></cite></div><div class="eFM0qc"><span><div class="action-menu"><a class="GHDvEf" href="#" id="am-b4" aria-label="Result options" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true" role="button" jsaction="m.tdd;keydown:m.hbke;keypress:m.mskpe" data-ved="2ahUKEwj5mYaGz_LoAhU0Ln0KHYVbDTwQ7B0wBHoECAYQBA"><span class="mn-dwn-arw"></span></a><ol class="action-menu-panel" role="menu" tabindex="-1" jsaction="keydown:m.hdke;mouseover:m.hdhne;mouseout:m.hdhue" data-ved="2ahUKEwj5mYaGz_LoAhU0Ln0KHYVbDTwQqR8wBHoECAYQBQ"><li class="action-menu-item" role="menuitem"><a class="fl" href="https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:98wfAk7-s24J:https://gist.github.com/Zen-CODE/650099bd55247223986928f12df42176+&amp;cd=5&amp;hl=en&amp;ct=clnk&amp;gl=ca" ping="/url?sa=t&amp;source=web&amp;rct=j&amp;url=https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search%3Fq%3Dcache:98wfAk7-s24J:https://gist.github.com/Zen-CODE/650099bd55247223986928f12df42176%2B%26cd%3D5%26hl%3Den%26ct%3Dclnk%26gl%3Dca&amp;ved=2ahUKEwj5mYaGz_LoAhU0Ln0KHYVbDTwQIDAEegQIBhAG">Cached</a></li></ol></div></span></div></div></div>

<p class="msg-s-event-listitem__body t-14 t-black--light t-normal ">Salut Nico, juste un petit bonjour de Vancouver! Je pensais à toi dernièrement avec cette pandémie, et aussi parce-que ma copine est en Health Science à SFU (il me semble que tu etais dans le même département?). Linkedin m'a montré ton profil donc je me suis dit que je devrai dire bonjour. J'espère que tu vas bien. Je vois que tu as beaucoup voyagé avec Médecins sans Frontières, ça a l'air genial! J'espère que tu t'y plais. A+</p>

#:kivy 1.11.1
ProcessHtml:

<ProcessHtml>:
    html_input: html_input
    url: url
    html_output: html_output
    BoxLayout:
        orientation: "vertical"
        ActionBar:
            pos_hint: {'top':1}
            ActionView:
                use_separator: True
                ActionPrevious:
                    title: "CorpusBuilder"
                    with_previous: False
                ActionButton:
                    text: "Re-run all saved"
                    on_press: root.pipeline_on_saved_data()
                ActionButton:
                    text: "Run"
                    on_press: root.pipeline() 
                ActionButton:
                    text: "Run+Save"
                    on_press: root.pipeline_and_save() 
                ActionGroup:
                    text: "Tools"
                    mode: "spinner"
                    dropdown_width: "200sp"
                    ActionButton:
                        text: 'Pretty Print'
                        on_press: root.pretty_clean()
                    ActionButton:
                        text: 'Escape html'
                        on_press: root.escape()
                    ActionButton:
                        text: 'Unescape html and pprint'
                        on_press: root.pprint_unescape()
                    ActionButton:
                        text: 'Clear ALL saved data'
                        on_press: root.clear_all_saved_data()
        TextInput:
            id: html_input
            multiline: True
            size_hint_y: 0.03
            auto_indent: True
            cursor_blink: True
            cursor_width: "2sp"
            hint_text: "Enter raw HTML"
        BoxLayout:
            orientation: "horizontal"
            size_hint_y: 0.03
            TextInput:
                id: url
                multiline: False
                auto_indent: False
                cursor_blink: True
                cursor_width: "2sp"
                hint_text: "Enter URL"
            Button:
                id: metaword
                text: "Click to add categories"
                on_press: print("ouch! More gently please")
                on_state: root.get_number_of_categories()
        BoxLayout:
            ScrollView:
                do_scroll_x: False
                do_scroll_y: True
                bar_width: 30
                scroll_type: ['content', 'bars']
                Label:
                    size_hint_y: None
                    height: self.texture_size[1]
                    text_size: self.width, None
                    padding: 10, 10
                    text: "### NO RESULT ###"
                    id: html_output
            Label:
                size_hint_y: None
                height: self.texture_size[1]
                padding: 10, 10
                text: "Categories"
                id: category_labels
